original_title: The Littlest Leaguers Learn to Play Baseball
overview: Computer-animated characters Mitt, BB, Slugger, Stevie and the rest of the Little Leaguers are in the dugout to teach your littlest athletes the ins and outs (if not exactly the finer points) of America's national pastime. A fun blend of songs, comedy and animation makes it a blast for kids to learn everything they need to know to play the game.
title: The Littlest Leaguers Learn to Play Baseball
